name: Teetering Empire
description:
Teetering Empire is a simple management simulator about keeping your Empire stable.

Manage the Empire that teeters on the edge of collapse. Send your loyal ministers out to spread your faith and your battle-thirsty armies. But don't trust them too much — who knows what they'll do behind your back.

Features:

  • Simple turn-based gameplay that will test both your reaction and your strategical thinking.
  • Procedurally generated quests that will shape the story of your Empire. Kinda.
  • All (well, most) of graphics, including dozens of ingame portraits in medieval style, were generated by an AI using a neural network.

This game was originally made as an entry for Ludum Dare 49. There you can find some devlogs of how the game's art was generated.
